FISSPy Map¶

fisspy.map Package¶

Functions¶

align(data0, header0[, missing]) Align the input data with its header.
fissmap(data0, header0[, pre_align]) Make sunpy.map.Map for given data and header.
map_header(header0) Header change to correct the fissmap
map_rot_correct(mmap, refx, refy, reftime) Correct the solar rotation.
